title: Baby Pathe Projector PB-EX
brief_description:
Baby Projector Pathe PB-EX 1926c
-Asbestos removed November 2019 by ACMI Facilities, replacement block and cords (black rope) made by Brendan Andersen to mimic the appearance of original parts containing asbestos.
